tissue.column_query: tissuename as id, species, tumortype, organ, gender
tissue.queryCategories: SELECT distinct %(col)s as cat FROM ${table} WHERE %(col)s is not null AND %(col)s <> ''

query: SELECT ${targid_bioinfodb.index_tissue}, ${targid_bioinfodb.views.tissue.column_query}
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue t
WHERE species = :species
SELECT a.ensg as id, a.symbol, max(cnv) as score

FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_copynumber ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_public}targid_gene a ON a.ensg = ab.ensg INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue b ON b.tissuename= ab.tissuename
WHERE ab.cn = :cn AND b.tumortype = :tumortype AND cnv >

(SELECT max(cnv) FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_copynumber ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue b ON b.tissuename = ab.tissuename WHERE ab.cn = :cn AND b.tumortype = :tumortype AND ab.ensg = :ensg)
GROUP BY a.ensg
SELECT d.ensg as id, d.tissuename, cn, d.log2fpkm as expr, d.dna_mutated, g.symbol

FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_data d INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue c ON d.tissuename = c.tissuename INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_gene g ON d.ensg = g.ensg
WHERE c.tumortype = :tumortype AND d.ensg in (%(ensgs)s)
SELECT ensg as id, %(agg)s(%(score)s) as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue b ON b.tissuename = ab.tissuename
WHERE b.tumortype = :tumortype
GROUP BY ab.ensg
SELECT ensg as id, %(agg)s(%(score)s) as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab
GROUP BY ab.ensg
SELECT b.tissuename as id, b.species, b.organ, gender, ensg, %(score)s as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue b ON b.tissuename = ab.tissuename
WHERE b.tumortype = :tumortype AND ab.ensg in (%(ensgs)s)
SELECT b.tissuename as id, b.species, b.organ, gender, ensg, %(score)s as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue b ON b.tissuename = ab.tissuename
WHERE ab.ensg in (%(ensgs)s)
SELECT tissuename as id, %(agg)s(%(score)s) as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_gene b ON b.ensg = ab.ensg
WHERE b.biotype = :biotype
GROUP BY ab.tissuename
SELECT tissuename as id, %(agg)s(%(score)s) as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab
GROUP BY ab.tissuename
SELECT b.ensg as id, b.symbol, b.species, b.strand, biotype, tissuename, %(score)s as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_gene b ON b.ensg = ab.ensg
WHERE b.biotype = :biotype AND ab.tissuename in (%(tissuenames)s)
SELECT b.ensg as id, b.symbol, b.species, b.strand, biotype, tissuename, %(score)s as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_expression ab INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_gene b ON b.ensg = ab.ensg
WHERE ab.tissuename in (%(tissuenames)s)
SELECT tissuename as id, cnv as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_copynumber
WHERE ensg = :ensg
SELECT tissuename as id, dnamutation as score
FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_mutation
WHERE ensg = :ensg
SELECT a.ensg as id, (ifnull(mut.mutated,0)+0.0) / a.total as score

FROM (SELECT count(*) as total, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_mutation m INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue c ON c.tissuename = m.tissuename WHERE c.tumortype = :tumortype group by ensg) a

LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as mutated, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_mutation m INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue c ON c.tissuename = m.tissuename WHERE c.tumortype = :tumortype AND dna_mutated = 't' group by ensg) mut
ON mut.ensg = a.ensg
SELECT a.ensg as id, (ifnull(mut.mutated,0)+0.0) / a.total as score
FROM (SELECT count(*) as total, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_mutation group by ensg) a
LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as mutated, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_mutation where dna_mutated = 't' group by ensg) mut ON mut.ensg = a.ensg
SELECT a.ensg as id, (ifnull(mut.mutated,0)+0.0) / a.total as score

FROM (SELECT count(*) as total, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_copynumber m INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue c ON c.tissuename = m.tissuename WHERE c.tumortype = :tumortype group by ensg) a

LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as mutated, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_copynumber m INNER JOIN ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_tissue c ON c.tissuename = m.tissuename WHERE c.tumortype = :tumortype AND cnv %(operator)s %(value)s group by ensg) mut
ON mut.ensg = a.ensg
SELECT a.ensg as id, (ifnull(mut.mutated,0)+0.0) / a.total as score
FROM (SELECT count(*) as total, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_copynumber group by ensg) a
LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as mutated, ensg FROM ${targid_bioinfodb.schema_tissue}targid_copynumber WHERE cnv %(operator)s %(value)s group by ensg) mut ON mut.ensg = a.ensg
